original_text:
“Lay down a pledge for me with you;
    who is there who will put up security for me?
korean_text: 청하건대 나에게 담보물을 주소서 나의 손을 잡아 줄 자가 누구리이까

sentences.original_text: Lay down a pledge for me with you
sentences.korean_translation: 너희에게 나를 위해 보증을 서 주라

sentences.original_text: who will put up security for me?
